text: Dillingen or Dillingen an der Donau (, Dillingen at the Danube) is a town in Swabia, Bavaria, Germany. It is the administrative center of the district of Dillingen. ==Twin towns== * Bondeno, Italy * Brand-Erbisdorf, Germany * Naas, Ireland ==References== ==Other websites== * The town's official website * Photos of works of art in Dillingen, in the Warburg Institute Iconographic Database Category:Dillingen (district)
title: Dillingen an der Donau
